problem.p: Consider a reference frame fixed on the ground
Interactions: Earth, track. Assume no friction; therefore there is no horizontal force on the system and the x-component of the momentum of the system is constant during the process.

ul.li: Initial state is the instant right before throwing the ball. At this instant the three objects are at rest.

Final state is right after throwing the ball. At this instant of time, both the cart and the person are moving together at \(v_{f,cart}\) with respect to ground and the ball is moving at \(v_{f,ball}\) with respect to the ground and at \(v'_{f,ball}\) with respect to the cart.
